pullRequest.title: Add version of attribute setters that operate on Attributes.
pullRequest.bodyText: They're AttributeSetters so should work on Attributes ;) And comes in handy when adding semantic attributes to events and resources.

nodes.bodyText: This is needed in the other PR :)
